name: Event Tag Editor
description: The "Event Tag Editor" tool allows you to plot data from a dataset, and "tag" event time intervals through a visual click and drag feature.  This makes it easy to view and update event times and tags quickly for many participants.

fields.name: number
fields.label: Event Number
fields.doc: A unique identifier for an event.

fields.name: start_time
fields.label: Event Start Time
fields.doc: The date and time of the start of the event.

fields.name: end_time
fields.label: Event End Time
fields.doc: The date and time of the end of the event.

fields.name: note
fields.label: Tag Note
fields.doc: Arbitrary notes on the event or tags.

fields.name: tags
fields.label: List of Tags
fields.doc: One or more tags that label the event.

fields.name: profile_code
fields.label: Profile Code
fields.doc: The profile code from which the event was created.

fields.name: profile_version
fields.label: Profile Version
fields.doc: The version of the profile code from which the event was created.
